intro: One city. One detective. No mercy.
description:
Step into the neon-lit shadows of a futuristic metropolis and become Kayne—a hardened detective on a mission for revenge. 

Explore the neon-lit alleys of Neon City, where violence, betrayal, and lies wait around every corner. From third-person perspective, use your sharp reflexes and bullet-time mechanics to dominate cinematic combat encounters. 
As you dig deeper, uncover a dark conspiracy that reaches the highest levels of power.

In a world where trust is rare and every decision shapes your path, Kayne must navigate a maze of manipulation, face powerful enemies, and confront a past that refuses to stay buried.

Key Features:

- Bullet-Time Combat – Execute enemies with slow-motion precision in intense, cinematic shootouts.

 - Dark Conspiracy– Uncover a network of corruption that reaches the highest levels of power.

- Futuristic Exploration – Traverse vibrant cityscapes, shadowy corridors, and high-tech hideouts.

- Cyber-Noir Atmosphere – Immerse yourself in a stylish, neon-drenched world with atmospheric soundscapes.

In Neon City, revenge isn’t just a motive—it’s a way of life. Prepare to face the truth, no matter the cost, in Max Cyber Shooter.
